lines.text: Shut it!
You've slept with him too?
Oh Christ! Don't start that again! Yes, often. Separately and together. Sometimes with an audience and sometimes...
Shut it!
Remember, no guns unless they use 'em.
[arresting an armed robber at the end of a very violent punch-up]
All right, Tinkerbell. You're nicked!
[Carter pulls out a packet of cigarettes and puts one in his mouth]
Sorry, Guv, I've only got one left.
[Regan takes the cigarette out of Carter's mouth and puts it in his own]
I only *want* one.
[Regan fumbles for his lighter]
You got a light?
Nope.
Bastard.
I'll give you a call first thing in the morning.
We'd rather you called me, it's what I'm paid for.
Oh he pays you does he? Seems like the other way round to me.
Frank, please!
[slurring]
I'll give you your interview...
Yes you will.
[to McQueen]
Earn your money, will you - make sure he's sober.
Leave it alone!
Stan Morris? Leave it aht! He couldn't organise a piss-up in a brewery.
Highly inventive! Evidence? Now will you and your sergeant go back to your stripclub or wherever it is you masquerade as police officers.
...now, sod off!
you may be Special Branch but that doesn't make you God almighty!
Do you know what, Jack? You're full of shit.
I thought it was about time you made an intellectual contribution to this debate.
Bollocks.
[Carter walks out]
Sod it!
[Regan hears a police siren]
Oh shit!
[Bianca is on the telephone to Elliot McQueen. The other side of the conversation is inaudible]
Oh, why me again?... Because he's an animal, that's why... Oh all right, all right, just this once. But only him, not all his perverted brothers. I've still got the bloody bruises.
I'm sure Mr McQueen won't be too long.
Oh sod this! Who the hell does he think he is?
Check out the guys he works with - those cops are as thick as thieves.
I'm a whore - that's what I am!
Guvnor? I think you've gone diddle-o.
[talking about McQueen]
He should be locked up in the bloody Tower.
That's exactly where MI5 have got him - the Tower Hotel.

Jack you're full of shit. Bollocks, you're pissed off because they didn't go down on their hands and knees to you at Fulham - "Ah it's Jack Regan, mastermind of the Sweeney police come to help us out" - and you've bored me all night tryin' to prove otherwise!
Well you don't have to stay, you know!
Too bleedin' right I don't. See ya!
